results.title: Prolonged administration of letrozole induces polycystic ovary syndrome leading to osteoporosis in rats: model development and validation studies.
results.text_hl: However, the @<m>DISEASE_Ovarian_Cysts</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010048 @@@ovarian cysts@@@ did not regress even with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ administered with 1.0 mg/kg of @CHEMICAL_Letrozole @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077289 @@@letrozole@@@.

citations.NLM: Usmani Z, Ahmad S, Usmani Z, Mishra T, Najmi AK, Amin S, Altaf A, Mir SR. Prolonged administration of letrozole induces polycystic ovary syndrome leading to osteoporosis in rats: model development and validation studies. Naunyn Schmiedebergs Arch Pharmacol. 2025 Feb 20;():. PMID: 39976717

results.title: Activation of Adenosine Monophosphate-Activated Protein Kinase Is an Additional Mechanism That Participates in Mediating Inhibitory Actions of Prostaglandin F2Alpha in Mature, but Not Developing, Bovine Corpora Lutea.
results.text_hl: Changes in basal @CHEMICAL_propiverine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C015586 @@@P4@@@ secretion in vitro were determined in response to AMPK activation via @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@met@@@) or @CHEMICAL_AICA_ribonucleotide @CHEMICAL_MESH:C031143 @@@5-aminoimidazole-4-carboxamide ribonucleotide@@@ (@CHEMICAL_AICA_ribonucleotide @CHEMICAL_MESH:C031143 @@@AICAR@@@) in d-4 and d-10 @<m>DISEASE_Ovarian_Cysts</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010048 @@@CL@@@.

citations.NLM: Bowdridge EC, Goravanahally MP, Inskeep EK, Flores JA. Activation of Adenosine Monophosphate-Activated Protein Kinase Is an Additional Mechanism That Participates in Mediating Inhibitory Actions of Prostaglandin F2Alpha in Mature, but Not Developing, Bovine Corpora Lutea.
